description: Authentication Service module handling login, registration, token management, user profile updates, and password reset functionalities.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user with email and password, stores token and user info in local storage.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user, stores token and user info if account is approved.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Fetches the current authenticated user's details.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication tokens and user info from local storage.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a valid auth token exists in local storage.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates user's profile information such as name and professional title.

methods.name: getAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from local storage.

methods.name: getUserRole
methods.description: Retrieves the user's role from stored user data.

methods.name: getDashboardRoute
methods.description: Returns dashboard route URL based on user role.

methods.name: forgotPassword
methods.description: Initiates password reset process by email.

methods.name: resetPassword
methods.description: Resets user password using provided token and new password.
